title: Beijing Bound #4 - Cornelius Kersten & Phil Smith
itunes:title: Beijing Bound #4 - Cornelius Kersten & Phil Smith
itunes:subtitle: Team GB's first Long Tracker in 30 years & Paralympics GB's Chef de Mission as the Wheelchair Curling team is named!
description:
Back to work this week? It's never stopped for the British athletes heading off to the second Olympics and Paralympics in six months...


Team GB have picked 27 year old Cornelius Kersten as their first long track speed skater since 1992 - we hear how he 'brewed' up his success at the recent World Cups...‚òïÔ∏è


Paralympics GB Chef De Mission Phil Smith joins us too to discuss the first athletes confirmed for Beijing in 2 months times - the British wheelchair curlers - skip Hugh Nibloe, Gregor Ewan, Meggan Dawson-Farrell, David Melrose & Charlotte McKenna...


This is Beijing Bound from Anything but Footy - the countdown to the 2022 Winter Games...


(üì∏ Skater Cornelius Kersten credit: Vincent Riemersma)


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
